QuestData.Title: Her Will, Inflicted
QuestData.Description:
I feel myself drawn across the double bridges to the west...
Lysonia must be there.
Come, $n. We must confront her before she can escape again. Who knows what she plans.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: We must stop Lysonia before she can enact whatever dark purpose she and her master hold.
QuestData.LogDescription: Confront Lysonia in the Altar of Domination.
